item.name: 服务器异常登录用户监控[abnormal.login]
Agent ping
item.description: The agent always returns 1 for this item. It could be used in combination with nodata() for availability check.

item.name: 监控服务器是否有异常定时器[crontab]
系统错误监控:["Out of memory"]
系统错误监控:["table full, dropping packet"]
系统错误监控:["time wait bucket table overflow"]
Processor load (1 min average per core)
item.description: The processor load is calculated as system CPU load divided by number of CPU cores.

item.name: Processor load (5 min average per core)
item.description: The processor load is calculated as system CPU load divided by number of CPU cores.

item.name: Processor load (15 min average per core)
item.description: The processor load is calculated as system CPU load divided by number of CPU cores.

item.name: CPU $2 time
item.description: The time the CPU has spent doing nothing.

item.name: CPU $2 time
item.description: The amount of time the CPU has been servicing hardware interrupts.

item.name: CPU $2 time
item.description: Amount of time the CPU has been waiting for I/O to complete.

item.name: CPU $2 time
item.description: The time the CPU has spent running users' processes that have been niced.

item.name: CPU $2 time
item.description: The amount of time the CPU has been servicing software interrupts.

item.name: CPU $2 time
item.description: The amount of CPU 'stolen' from this virtual machine by the hypervisor for other tasks (such as running another virtual machine).

item.name: CPU $2 time
item.description: The time the CPU has spent running the kernel and its processes.

item.name: CPU $2 time
item.description: The time the CPU has spent running users' processes that are not niced.

item.name: Number of logged in users
item.description: Number of users who are currently logged in.

item.name: Available memory
item.description: Available memory is defined as free+cached+buffers memory.

item_prototype.name: Disk :[{#DEVNAME}] I/O请求平均执行时间,包括发送请求和执行的时间
Disk：[{#DEVNAME}] 每秒发送到设备的读入请求数
Disk：[{#DEVNAME}] 每秒从设备读入的数据量
Disk：[{#DEVNAME}] 将读入请求合并后,每秒发送到设备的读入请求数
Disk：[{#DEVNAME}] 发送到设备的I/O请求的平均执行时间
Disk :[{#DEVNAME}] 在I/O请求发送到设备期间,占用CPU时间的百分比
Disk：[{#DEVNAME}] 每秒发送到设备的写入请求数
Disk：[{#DEVNAME}] 每秒向设备写入的数据量
Disk：[{#DEVNAME}] 将写入请求合并后,每秒发送到设备的写入请求数

graph_prototype.name: Disk: {#DEVNAME}每秒发送到设备的读/写数据量
Disk: {#DEVNAME}每秒发送到设备的读/写请求数

item_prototype.name: 监控端口:[{#PORTNAME}] 是否配置防火墙规则

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} 未对端口:[{#PORTNAME}],配置防火墙规则，请尽快进行配置

discovery_rule.name: Network interface discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of network interfaces as defined in global regular expression "Network interfaces for discovery".

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} 网卡[{#IFNAME}] 出去的流量最近半小时的平均值，大于或等于前一天的同一时刻的两倍，请检查是否正常！！
{HOST.NAME} 网卡[{#IFNAME}] 出去的流量最近半小时的平均值，小于或等于前一天的同一时刻的一半，请检查是否正常！！
{HOST.NAME} 网卡[{#IFNAME}] 进来的流量最近半小时的平均值，大于或等于前一天的同一时刻的两倍，请检查是否正常！！
{HOST.NAME} 网卡[{#IFNAME}] 进来的wang流量最近11111111半小时的平均值,，小于或等于前一天的同一时刻的一半，请检查是否正常！

item_prototype.name: 监控进程:[{#PROCESSNAME}] 是否绑定了外网IP

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} 进程:[{#PROCESSNAME}],绑定的IP为外网IP，请尽快调整为内网IP！！

discovery_rule.name: Mounted filesystem discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of file systems of different types as defined in global regular expression "File systems for discovery".

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} /etc/passwd was changed
{HOST.NAME} 5min内发现超过3个异常用户登录
{HOST.NAME} available memory < 2G
{HOST.NAME} CPU iowait > %90
trigger.description: OS spends significant time waiting for I/O (input/output) operations. It could be indicator of performance issues with storage system.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} CPU Load >20
{HOST.NAME} free swap space <50%
trigger.description: It probably means that the systems requires more physical memory.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} has just been restarted
{HOST.NAME} Hostname was changed
{HOST.NAME} is unavailable by ICMP for 10 minutes
{HOST.NAME} Ping loss >20%

dependency.name: {HOST.NAME} is unavailable by ICMP for 10 minutes

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} Response time >50ms

dependency.name: {HOST.NAME} is unavailable by ICMP for 10 minutes

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} Zabbix agent is nodata for 10 minutes

dependency.name: {HOST.NAME} is unavailable by ICMP for 10 minutes

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} 发现系统中time_wait过多,超过tcp_max_tw_buckets设置值，请及时查看！！
{HOST.NAME} 发现系统中出现I/0 error，请及时查看！！
{HOST.NAME} 发现系统中出现内存溢出，请及时查看！！
{HOST.NAME} 发现系统中有程序出现coredump，请及时查看！！
{HOST.NAME} 发现系统中防火墙表满，请及时查看！！
{HOST.NAME} 发现系统存在异常定时器，请及时确认，若为正常定时器，请修改模板，增加新的过滤规则。
{HOST.NAME} 可用内存最近半小时的平均值，小于或等于前一天的同一时刻的一半，请检查是否正常！！
{HOST.NAME} 未开启防火墙，请尽快开启！！！
